description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Zombie apocalypse has come!!1 Can you survive zombie hordes, mines and heat seeking missiles to safely get to tha choppa in this twisted and addictive reaction game? Global high scores will put your skill to the ultimate test!
